title: NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2026 - Apply for Project Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Technology (NIT Karnataka) has declared the latest job notification for 2026. To fill up the various vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mining Engineering or Civil Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NIT Karnataka Recruitment 2026 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligibl...
